author: fwyzard
body:
* CUDA 9.2.148
    Various fxes to CUDA libraries and NVCC compiler.

  * Patch 1 (9.2.174, released Aug 6, 2018)
    CUDA 9.2 Patch Update: This update includes performance improvements
    to cuBLAS GEMM APIs and bug fixes for CUPTI and cuda-gdb.
    See the CUDA 9.2 release notes for more details.

See https://docs.nvidia.com/cuda/pdf/CUDA_Toolkit_Release_Notes.pdf .
title: Update CUDA to version 9.2.148, patch 1 (10.2.x backport)
